trigger: Need for production-ready observability in enterprise AI systems
context: RIF requires comprehensive monitoring for hybrid knowledge system deployment
solution_pattern: Multi-dimensional monitoring with real-time processing and intelligent alerting

core_components.name: Real-Time Metrics Collection
core_components.description: Sub-100ms metric collection with minimal overhead

core_components.name: Advanced Alerting System
key_features: Statistical anomaly detection with configurable thresholds
Alert throttling to prevent notification spam
Custom alert rules for different metric types

core_components.name: Web Dashboard
key_features: System health overview with status indicators
JSON export capabilities for external integration

core_components.name: Shadow Mode Integration
core_components.description: Full compatibility with parallel testing framework
key_features: Accuracy scoring algorithms for result comparison
Custom comparison handlers for different operations

architecture.integration: Compatible with existing RIF monitoring infrastructure

success_criteria: Comprehensive metrics collection for all system components
Real-time dashboard providing system health visibility
Shadow mode integration for migration validation

lessons_learned.lesson: Multi-dimensional monitoring essential for enterprise AI
lessons_learned.details: System resources, application performance, business logic, and user experience all require monitoring
lessons_learned.impact: Enables proactive issue detection and resolution

lessons_learned.lesson: Real-time processing with sub-100ms requirements achievable
lessons_learned.details: Careful architecture enables <100ms metric collection with <500ms dashboard response
lessons_learned.impact: Provides immediate visibility into system health

lessons_learned.details: Multi-channel alerts with throttling and escalation policies essential

reusable_components.description: Core monitoring system with thread-safe operations
